mapper.insert:
SELECT RefundSeq.nextval AS "refundNo" FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO Refund (refundNo, account, bank, name, refundType, orderNo, refundDate, userNo) VALUES(#{refundNo}, #{account}, #{bank}, #{name}, #{refundType}, #{order.orderNo}, SYSDATE,#{user.userNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT refundNo, account, bank, name, refundType, refund.orderNo as "order.orderNo", refundDate, Normal.title "order.title" FROM Refund, ordertable, normal WHERE refundNo = #{refundNo} and normal.saleNo = ordertable.saleNo and refund.orderNo = ordertable.orderNo
